customer.description: The customer table contains essential information about individuals who are customers, including their unique identifiers and personal details.

columns.customer_id: The unique identifier assigned to each customer.
columns.first_name: The given name of the customer, typically the name they are called by in social contexts.
columns.last_name: The family name or surname of the customer, used to identify their lineage.
columns.email: The email address of the customer, used for communication and account recovery.
